name: HKDevicePlacementSide
desc: Values that indicate the placement of the device that measured a sample.

items.name: case central
items.desc: A device predominately located near the center of the body.

items.name: case left
items.desc: A device predominately located on the left side.

items.name: case right
items.desc: A device predominately located on the right side.

items.name: case unknown
items.desc: The system couldn’t determine the device’s placement.
